dcl_constantbuffer cb0[57], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[6], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb2[3], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb3[19], immediateIndexed
dcl_sampler s0, mode_default
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t0
dcl_input v0.xyz
dcl_input v1.xy
dcl_input v2.xyz
dcl_input v3.w
dcl_output_siv o0.xyzw, position

dcl_output o2.xyzw
dcl_output o3.xyz
dcl_output o4.xyz
dcl_output o5.xyz
dcl_output o6.xyz
dcl_output o7.xyz
dcl_output o8.xy
dcl_temps 5

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r4.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

itof r0.xyz, v0.xyzx
mad r0.xyz, r0.xyzx, cb1[5].yyyy, cb1[5].xxxx
add r0.z, r0.z, cb1[2].w
add r1.z, r0.z, l(0.050000)
add r1.x, r0.x, cb1[0].w
add r1.y, r0.y, cb1[1].w
add r0.xyz, r1.xyzx, -cb0[42].xyzx
mov r0.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r2.x, r0.xyzw, cb0[20].xyzw
dp4 r2.y, r0.xyzw, cb0[21].xyzw
dp4 r2.w, r0.xyzw, cb0[23].xyzw
dp4 o0.z, r0.xyzw, cb0[22].xyzw
mov o0.xyw, r2.xyxw

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed bc4c55b4f7e0fcee-vs.txt
ne r4.w, r2.w, l(1.0)
if_nz r4.w
  add r4.w, r2.w, -r4.y
  mad r2.x, r4.w, r4.x, r2.x
endif

mul r3.xyzw, r2.xyww, cb0[34].xyzw
mov o7.z, r2.w
add o7.xy, r3.zwzz, r3.xyxx
mad r2.xy, r1.yxyy, cb2[0].yxyy, cb2[0].wzww
mov o5.xyz, r1.xyzx
sample_l_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.w, r2.xyxx, t0.xzwy, s0, l(0.000000)
mad r0.w, r0.w, cb2[2].x, cb2[2].y
add r0.w, -r0.w, r1.z
mul_sat r0.w, -r0.w, cb3[18].x
sqrt r0.w, r0.w
dp2 r1.x, r0.xyxx, r0.xyxx
mad r1.x, cb2[1].x, r1.x, cb2[1].y
mul_sat r1.x, r1.x, l(3.000000)
mul r0.w, r0.w, r1.x
dp3 r1.x, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
rsq r1.x, r1.x
mul r1.yzw, r0.yyzx, r1.xxxx
dp3 r0.x, cb0[48].xyzx, r0.xyzx
mul o2.w, r0.x, cb0[31].w
mov r1.x, l(1.000000)
dp4 r0.x, cb3[15].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.y, cb3[16].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.z, cb3[17].xyzw, r1.xyzw
max r0.xyz, r0.xyzx, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
dp4 r2.x, cb0[38].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r2.y, cb0[37].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r2.z, cb0[36].xyzw, r1.xyzw
max r1.xyz, r2.xyzx, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
mad r0.xyz, r0.xyzx, cb0[56].xxxx, -r1.xyzx
mad o1.xyz, r0.wwww, r0.xyzx, r1.xyzx
add_sat o1.w, v3.w, v3.w
mad r0.xyz, v2.xyzx, l(2.000000, 2.000000, 2.000000, 0.000000), l(-1.000000, -1.000000, -1.000000, 0.000000)
dp3 r1.x, r0.xyzx, cb1[0].xyzx
dp3 r1.y, r0.xyzx, cb1[1].xyzx
dp3 r1.z, r0.xyzx, cb1[2].xyzx
dp3 r0.x, r1.xyzx, r1.xyzx
rsq r0.x, r0.x
mul o2.xyz, r0.xxxx, r1.xyzx
mov o3.xyz, l(0,0,0,0)
mov o4.xyz, l(0,0,0,0)
mov o6.xyz, l(0,0,0,0)
itof r0.xy, v1.xyxx
mad o8.xy, r0.xyxx, cb1[5].wwww, cb1[5].zzzz
ret 
// Approximately 57 instruction slots used
